data.enText: to recognize that there is a difference between people or things; to show a difference between people or things

data.chText: 这计算机程序不能辨别字母与数字。
data.enText: The computer program was unable to discriminate between letters and numbers.

data.chText: 婴儿什么时候学会辨别嗓音呢？
data.enText: When do babies learn to discriminate voices?

data.chText: 有许多特征使这一物种与其他物种区别开来。
data.enText: A number of features discriminate this species from others.
to treat one person or group worse/better than another in an unfair way
practices that discriminate against women and in favour of men

data.chText: 因种族、性别或宗教信仰而有所歧视是非法的。
data.enText: It is illegal to discriminate on grounds of race, sex or religion.

simple_means.memory_skill: dis 加强 + crimin 搞清；区别 + ate 表动词 → 区分〔对待〕→ 区别；歧视

example: I could not discriminate the different tastes in this complicated dish

tr: treat differently on the basis of sex or race
marked by the ability to see or make fine distinctions

value.def: If you can discriminate between two things, you can recognize that they are different.

example.ex: He is incapable of discriminating between a good idea and a terrible one...
The device can discriminate between the cancerous and the normal cells.
example.tran: 这台仪器可以辨别癌细胞和正常的细胞。

value.def: To discriminate against a group of people or in favour of a group of people means to unfairly treat them worse or better than other groups.

example.ex: They believe the law discriminates against women.
example.tran: 他们认为该项法律歧视女性。

example.ex: ...legislation which would discriminate in favour of racial minorities...
The Commission for Racial Equality teaches organisations not to discriminate.
example.tran: 种族平等委员会告诫各家机构不要心存歧视。

partsOfSpeech.dec: crimin 罪 + al 表名词 → 罪犯
dis 分离 + crimin 罪 + ate 做，造成，使… → 非法将人分离 → 歧视
dis 分离 + crimin 罪 + atory 有…性质的 → 歧视的
in 使… + crimin 罪 + ate 使… → 使负罪
re 相反 + crimin 罪 + ate 表名词 → 反说你有罪 → 反责

rootsaffixes.indicate: = to be sure, to separate 搞清；区别
rootsaffixes.title: cern, cert, cret, crimin

partsOfSpeech.dec: as 加强 + certain 肯定的 → 一再区别 → 确定
cert 搞清；区别 + ain 表名词 → 搞清的 → 肯定的
cert 搞清；区别 + ific 产生…的 + ate 表总称 → 能够作证明的东西 → 证明书
cert 搞清；区别 + ify 使… → 使…清楚 → 证明
cert 搞清；区别 + itude 表情况 → 搞清楚 → 确信
con 加强 + cern 搞清；区别 → 需要搞清楚 → 关心
dis 加强 + cern 搞清；区别 → 识别
dis 加强 + cret 搞清；区别 + e → 加以区别 → 不同的
dis 加强 + cret 搞清；区别 + ion 表状态 → 一再搞清楚 → 谨慎
dis 加强 + crimin 搞清；区别 + ate 做，造成，使… → 区分〔对待〕→ 区别；歧视
dis 加强 + crimin 搞清；区别 + at〔e〕具有…的，有…性质的 + ing 正…的，令人…的 → 有辨别能力的
in 不 + discriminate 歧视 → 不加区别的；一视同仁的
partsOfSpeech.d: 不加区别的；一视同仁的
